source:
{
  "name": "TaskBan",
  "version": "0.0.0",
  "description": "kanban board web application made with AngularJS, NodeJS, ExpressJS and MongoDB",
  "main": "app.js",
  "dependencies": {
    "angular": "^1.5.5",
    "angular-animate": "^1.5.5",
    "angular-aria": "^1.5.5",
    "angular-dragula": "^1.2.2",
    "angular-material": "http://github.com/angular/bower-material/tarball/v1.1.0-rc4",
    "angular-messages": "^1.5.5",
    "angular-mocks": "^1.5.5",
    "angular-route": "^1.5.5",
    "angular-sanitize": "^1.5.5",
    "bcryptjs": "^2.3.0",
    "body-parser": "^1.14.2",
    "email-validator": "^1.0.4",
    "express": "^4.13.3",
    "jsonwebtoken": "^5.5.4",
    "mongoose": "^4.4.14",
    "morgan": "^1.6.1",
    "nodemailer": "^2.5.0",
    "rand-token": "^0.2.1"
  },
  "engines": {
    "node": "4.3.0",
    "npm": "3.7.3"
  },
  "devDependencies": {},
  "scripts": {
    "test": "echo \"Error: no test specified\" && exit 1",
    "start": "node server.js"
  },
  "repository": {
    "type": "git",
    "url": "git+ssh://git@github.com/juangranadilla/TaskBan-web/"
  },
  "author": "Juan Jos√© Granadilla Manzano",
  "license": "GPL-3.0",
  "homepage": "https://github.com/juangranadilla/TaskBan-web/"
